overview: While grieving the death of her partner, Anna befriends her son's dinosaur toy called "GIGANTOSAURUS." Anna feels small for a person with such big hopes and dreams, and Gigantosaurus feels small for a dinosaur (after all they are a toy). Gigantosaurus and Anna fall in love, and discover ways to feel big in a mortal world where our time is so limited, just a spec, but time itself is infinite. Anna discovers that maybe her life is small, but she can be big in it.
title: I Am a Gigantosaurus, Actually
